product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Cube
long_description: Organize and compress your clothing and gear with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Cube, so you can get the most out of every square inch of your travel bag. Made of washable, odor-resistant polyester with a mesh top so you can see what's inside. Compresses either folded or rolled T-shirts, underwear and other clothing items; can also be used for road trip games for kids. 2-way zippered opening makes it easy to open and close when fully packed. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Cube measures 10 in. x 7 in. x 3 in. Pack-It Cubes are also available in other sizes.
short_description: Organize and compress your clothing and gear with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Cube, so you can get the most out of every square inch of your travel bag.
